full_text:
Here is the final statement that [b](6)[/b] can send to all media who contacted MCC NY on Epstein last night and this morning
From [b](6), (b)(7)(C)[/b]
To [b](6), (b)(7)(C)[/b] Lee Plourde [b](6), (b)(7)(C)[/b]
Date 2019/07/25 10:58
Subject: Here is the final statement that [b](6), (b)(7)(C)[/b] can send to all media who contacted MCC NY on Epstein last night and this morning
Attachments: TEXT.htm
Wow, right as I finished my last email, my boss just gave me the final response that I'll now send to all the reporters who reached out to our public affairs office in Central Office (you can send this to media who contacted you too [b](6)[/b]).
Jeffrey Epstein is currently housed at MCC New York and not in a local hospital as has been reported. As with all inmates, for privacy and security reasons, we do not share information on an inmate's medical status or their conditions of confinement.
[b](6), (b)(7)(C)[/b]
Public Information Office
Federal Bureau of Prisons
(202) 353-[b](6)[/b]
>>> [b](6), (b)(7)(C)[/b] 7/25/2019 10:54 AM >>>
[b](6), (b)(7)(C)[/b]
[b](5)[/b]
I'll send you all the final approved response from DOJ when I get it.
Thanks,
[b](6), (b)(7)(C)[/b]
Public Information Office
Federal Bureau of Prisons
(202) 353-[b](6), (b)(7)(C)[/b]
Page 3864
DOJ-OGR-00023868

text_blocks.content: Here is the final statement that [b](6)[/b] can send to all media who contacted MCC NY on Epstein last night and this morning

From [b](6), (b)(7)(C)[/b]
To [b](6), (b)(7)(C)[/b] Lee Plourde [b](6), (b)(7)(C)[/b]
Date 2019/07/25 10:58
Subject: Here is the final statement that [b](6), (b)(7)(C)[/b] can send to all media who contacted MCC NY on Epstein last night and this morning
Attachments: TEXT.htm

Wow, right as I finished my last email, my boss just gave me the final response that I'll now send to all the reporters who reached out to our public affairs office in Central Office (you can send this to media who contacted you too [b](6)[/b]).

Jeffrey Epstein is currently housed at MCC New York and not in a local hospital as has been reported. As with all inmates, for privacy and security reasons, we do not share information on an inmate's medical status or their conditions of confinement.

Public Information Office

[b](6), (b)(7)(C)[/b]
Public Information Office
Federal Bureau of Prisons
(202) 353-[b](6), (b)(7)(C)[/b]

additional_notes: The document contains multiple redactions, indicated by [b](6)[/b], [b](7)(C)[/b], and [b](5)[/b]. The content is an email discussing Jeffrey Epstein's status at MCC New York.
